General.Name: Odysight.ai Inc. Common Stock
General.Description: Odysight.ai Inc., together with its subsidiaries, develops, produces, and markets visualization AI solutions in Israel, the United States, and internationally. The company, through its visualization technology offers solutions across predictive maintenance and condition-based monitoring markets by advanced AI-driven sensor visualization solutions in various sectors, such as aerospace, defense, transportation, maritime, energy and medical industries. Odysight.ai Inc. is based in Omer, Israel.
